name: swig-cli
description: Swig is a simple CLI tool for automating dev workflows via compositions of series and parallel tasks.

scripts.npmInstallAll: npm install && node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts  npmInstallAll
scripts.build: node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts cleanDist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts insertVersionNumbers
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --p tsconfig.cjs.json && node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts updateCjsOutput
scripts.pack: node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts cleanPackedDir && npm pack --pack-destination packed
scripts.updateExamples: npm run build && npm run pack && node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts updateExampleDependencies
scripts.updateExamplesAndSmokeTest: npm run updateExamples && node --no-warnings --import tsx tasks.ts smokeTest

author: Mike Thompson
